Revert "wifi: mac80211: fix memory leak in ieee80211_if_add()"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.90 by commit 982c8b1e95c088f5d8f65967ec25be66e961401c, it was introduced in version v5.15.86 by commit 2e32f1299814e8aa2e75aa58704543a36ea3e201. For more details please see the references link.
summary: Revert "wifi: mac80211: fix memory leak in ieee80211_if_add()"
